__comments__: command is shared between both server create and server clone commands
before making changes please check clone logic in Schema.php for details
and be sure to test both commands thoroughly

flags.name: name
flags.usage: Server name (a-zA-Z0-9()_-). (must be at least 4 characters long, mandatory)

flags.name: datacenter
flags.usage: Server datacenter (EU, US-NY2, AS.. see server options subcommand). (mandatory)

flags.name: image
flags.usage: Server image name or image ID (see server options subcommand). (mandatory)

flags.name: cpu
flags.cloneUsage: CPU count and type. (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: ram
flags.usage: Size of server ram in MiB. (optional, default: 1024)
flags.cloneUsage: Size of server ram in MiB. (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: disk
flags.usage:
Configure Persistent Disks, Up to 4 disks allowed. (at least 1 is mandatory)
--disk id=ID,size=SIZE --disk <DISK2>..
ID: first disk # is 0. (optional, default is auto-incremented starting from 0)
SIZE: in GiB. (optional, defaults to one 20GB disk)
flags.cloneUsage:
Configure Persistent Disks, Up to 4 disks allowed. (optional, if provided overrides all source server disks)
--disk id=ID,size=SIZE --disk <DISK2>..
ID: first disk # is 0. (optional, default is auto-incremented starting from 0)
SIZE: in GiB. (optional, defaults to one 20GB disk)

flags.name: network
flags.usage:
Configure networking, up to 4 networks allowed. (at least 1 is mandatory)
--network id=ID,name=NAME,ip=IP --network <NETWORK2>..
ID: first network # is 0. (optional, default is auto-incremented starting from 0)
NAME: Set the network VLAN name, set 'wan' for wan interface, otherwise, set the name of an existing lan. (mandatory)
IP: Set the IP address of the server’s network interface. Set 'auto' for auto allocation. (mandatory)
flags.cloneUsage:
Configure networking, up to 4 networks allowed. (optional, if provided overrides all source server networks)
--network id=ID,name=NAME,ip=IP --network <NETWORK2>..
ID: first network # is 0. (optional, default is auto-incremented starting from 0)
NAME: Set the network VLAN name, set 'wan' for wan interface, otherwise, set the name of an existing lan. (mandatory)
IP: Set the IP address of the server’s network interface. Set 'auto' for auto allocation. (mandatory)

flags.name: password
flags.usage: Server password (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, !@#$^&*()~). (must be 10-20 characters long with at least 1 capital letter, 1 small letter and 1 digit, mandatory)
flags.cloneUsage: Server password (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, !@#$^&*()~). (must be 10-20 characters long with at least 1 capital letter, 1 small letter and 1 digit, mandatory)

flags.name: dailybackup
flags.usage: Set Daily Backup (yes | no). (optional, default: no)
flags.cloneUsage: Set Daily Backup (yes | no). (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: managed
flags.usage: Set Managed Hosting Services (yes | no). (optional, default: no)
flags.cloneUsage: Set Managed Hosting Services (yes | no). (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: quantity
flags.usage: Number of servers to create, up to 50 servers. (optional, default: 1)
flags.cloneUsage: Number of servers to create, up to 50 servers. (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: billingcycle
flags.usage: Servers' Billing Cycle. (hourly | monthly) (optional, default: hourly)
flags.cloneUsage: Servers' Billing Cycle. (hourly | monthly) (optional, default from source server)

flags.name: monthlypackage
flags.usage: Monthly billing cycle package (see server options subcommand). (optional in monthly billing cycle, default: t5000)
flags.cloneUsage: Monthly billing cycle package (see server options subcommand). (optional in monthly billing cycle, default from source server)

flags.name: poweronaftercreate
flags.usage: Power on server after server created. (optional, default: yes)
flags.cloneUsage: Power on server after server created. (optional, default: yes, not copied from source server)

flags.name: ssh-key
flags.usage: Path to public key file, adds to server authorized keys after create is done. (requires --wait)
flags.cloneUsage: Path to public key file, adds to server authorized keys after create is done. (requires --wait, not cloned from server server)
